author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body: Needs a compat entry for Julia itself at least.

You probably meant to support Julia 1 too, right? You need:
```
[compat]
julia = "0.7, 1"
```
in that case.

I've created release `v0.1.0`, [here](https://github.com/mlhetland/DotTestSets.jl/releases/tag/v0.1.0) it is.
<!-- d8b7a690-a7be-11e9-980e-6371421bb0d8 -->
